channel.title: Create a less permissive [view_only] data source group Modality
channel.description:
It will be great to have a lesser permissive **[View Only]** Group than could integrate less privileges.
For exemple, in our institution, we have read_only users that would not be able to download data from Dashboards neither view queries, even if they are behing part of a **[View Only]** Group
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7100281/135487521-fda6b296-75b1-4ca7-b4be-dbd165bf98df.png)
Would it be possible to add this datasource group modality @arikfr ?
